properties.name: Totem, Spell, Projectile, Fire, Channelling, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a totem that channels to fire a stream of flame at nearby enemies, and creates an area of consecrated ground around the totem.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
Consecrated Ground grants Immunity to Curses to you and Allies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have +2 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Supported Skills Summon two Totems instead of one
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Desecrates the ground, summoning corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area. The corpses will be chosen from the monsters in the current area and any Spectres that have existed in this instance.
explicitMods: Deals 31.4 Base Chaos Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Starlight Chalice
enchantMods: Used when an adjacent Flask is used
explicitMods: Inflict Fire, Cold and Lightning Exposure on nearby Enemies when used
26% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments you inflict during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Uhtred and his priests drank of the skies
to empower runes... and themselves.

items.name: Hrimsorrow
explicitMods: 100% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 100 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers
flavourText: Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

Gain Lifetap after Spending a total of 23 Life on Upfront

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.name: Enthralling Vision
explicitMods: Adds 7 to 12 Cold Damage to Attacks
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 10% increased Damage taken to Enemies
108% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Essence Worm
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled
flavourText: "This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 25% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 18% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Kaom's Heart
flavourText: The warrior who
fears will fall.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
explicitMods: Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills Deal 59% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Cold, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.

A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.
